info.name: NIST Cybersecurity Framework
info.main: Test your knowledge of the principles, functions, and best practices of the NIST Cybersecurity Framework.
info.results: Congratulations! You now have a solid understanding of how to implement and manage cybersecurity using the NIST Framework.

a.option: A set of activities and practices to manage an organization's cybersecurity risks
A practical guide for setting up a security operations center
A regulation on how information must be stored in an organization

questions.q: What is the first activity to perform in the NIST Cybersecurity Framework?

a.option: Identify critical systems and information assets
Establish policies for data storage
Create access controls for information systems

questions.q: What is the first step when starting a cybersecurity plan using the NIST Framework?

a.option: Identify and classify information assets, evaluate threats and vulnerabilities, and prioritize risks
Implement access controls and create backups
Review previous incidents and contact legal

questions.q: What measures can you implement to protect information systems?

a.option: Access controls, encryption, firewalls, employee training, clear policies, and regular backups
Only update software regularly
Limit internet access to employees

questions.q: What does the incident detection and response process look like?

a.option: Monitoring, planned response, analysis, containment, eradication, recovery, and lessons learned
Shut down systems, change passwords, and reboot servers
Wait for antivirus vendor confirmation before acting

questions.q: What is the approach to recover systems after a cyberattack?

a.option: Activate business continuity plans, restore from backups, apply patches, and monitor recovery
Call external tech support to assess damage
Format everything and restart without backups

questions.q: What is the best way to control the asset identification process?

a.option: Tagging each asset with physical labels
Creating an inventory with detailed asset information
Asking managers to provide the asset list

questions.q: What is the goal of an impact assessment?

a.option: The physical impact on information assets
The impact of implementing the NIST Framework on the organization
The impact of a security incident on the confidentiality, availability, and integrity of information

questions.q: How can we detect security events?

a.option: Through event monitoring
Through log analysis
Through communication with other departments

questions.q: Once an incident is detected, what is the next step?

a.option: Activate the incident response plan
Create backups
Report the incident and wait for instructions

questions.q: It is good practice to perform backups of critical data only once.

a.option: True
False
